definition: of worldwide scope or applicability, a sophisticated person who has travelled in many countries
details:
adjective
- of worldwide scope or applicability
= example: of worldwide scope or applicability
= synonyms: general
- composed of people from or at home in many parts of the world
- growing or occurring in many parts of the world
= example: growing or occurring in many parts of the world
= synonyms: widely distributed
noun
- a sophisticated person who has travelled in many countries
= synonyms: cosmopolite
